snippet: Volkswagen said its chief financial officer, Hans Dieter Pötsch, was set to become its new chairman, filling the position that Ferdinand Piëch vacated in April.
abstract: Volkswagen says its chief financial officer Hans Dieter Potsch will become chairman; Ferdinand Piech left as chairman in April.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen said its chief financial officer, Hans Dieter Pötsch, was set to become its new chairman, filling the position that Ferdinand Piëch vacated in April.

headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Moves to Elevate Its Finance Chief to Chairman
headline.main: Volkswagen Moves to Elevate Its Finance Chief to Chairman
